location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Assistant in Charge of the Residency, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter orders that the Barbara,following its arrival at Bushire, be sent on to Bussora [Basra] without delay. Warden also informs Bruce of a forthcoming visit to Bushire by the British Ambassador Extraordinary and Persian Envoy [Sir Gore Ouseley].
